alert.name: Redis Cache Used - Byte Actual alert

panels.description: Actual Bytes used in AWS Elasticache Redis. Alerts if usage is greater than 90% of env. E.g. vdev 1.55GB, staging and prod 3.0GB.
panels.title: Redis Cache Used - Byte Actual

alert.name: Redis Cache Misses to Hits ratio alert

panels.description: Alerts if ratio of misses to hits is greater than 0.4
panels.title: Redis Cache Misses to Hits ratio
